description:
How did we get here already?⠀
⠀
It feels like just yesterday that I took that pregnancy test. The most unexpected plus sign I’ve ever seen.⠀
⠀
I thought I wasn’t ready for you, but you had other plans. You were ready for your debut into this world.⠀
⠀
I struggled through out the whole pregnancy. I couldn’t make peace with it all. I could no longer achieve goals. I felt like my life got put on hold. The rhythm I had worked hard to create seemed to lose its beat.⠀
⠀
When you were born I thought it would get easier. That I would suddenly find my purpose again, be creative again, achieve things again. But that wasn’t the case.⠀
⠀
But through it all I found something else. I gained a voice, I opened my eyes to other matters, and I remembered that right now in this moment, my purpose is you. You, your brother, and your sister.⠀
⠀
Yes I will still accomplish things, set big goals and crush them, but there’s no longer a timer set.There’s no pressure to rush through life. You helped me to realize that small moves towards something big is how things get done.⠀
⠀
When my eyes are set on you I remember what I’m truly here to do. ❤️⠀
⠀
